name: HSP_BFH_SELECTED_HAR
description: Stores which hospital accounts were selected for a guarantor action.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HOSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the history of hospital accounts that were selected for a guarantor action.
